body:
i'm thankful that d is allowed and in fact encouraged to bring miso to the office and that despite miso being loud and inappropriate, her boss and all her coworkers love miso, and i'm thankful that she took miso to work with her yesterday. i'm thankful that i did not have to be miso's doorman and that i could leave my lunch on the coffee table and walk to the kitchen without worrying that she would eat it.

i'm thankful that i kind of passive aggressively mentioned kh not attending an upcoming party since she didn't respond when i mentioned it in the group chat because it turned out not replying was not, as i imagined, a hard rjection but instead was her just not paying attention and i'm thankful that since i mentioned it she might come. i'm thankful for my various group chats. i'm thankful that k and t are moving closer to us.

i'm thankful i kind of halfway fixed my standing desk and have been standing for large parts of every day this week. i'm thankful that in our weekly team meeting there is a section where you talk about low points and high points of the week and i'm thankful that when i talked about the low point being that i thought i really knew our app well and was going to be immediately fast and productive and instead have been humbled by all i don't know, everybody told me that was normal and not to worry about it. 

i'm thankful for [this video of AOC introducing bernie](https://twitter.com/CoachSiteman/status/1227442426526208001) in new hampshire over the beat from "sicko mode," which i have watched like 15 times because it gives me strong ASMR, especially the part where the drums are pumping in and she's saying "forward, forward, forward." i'm thankful there are so many good memes [dunking](https://twitter.com/KateAronoff/status/1226010928686211074) on pete buttigieg.

i'm thankful for how excited d was about _p.s. i still love you_, which we watched last night and which isn't perfect or as good as the first movie but still has lots of great parts. i'm thankful _love is blind_ is coming out tomorrow and i'm excited about it. i'm thankful to have been reading rebecca solnit's _wanderlust_ and to be in a fascinating section about wordsworth's walks through the lake district. i'm thankful for the switch game _speedrunners_, a side scrolling racing game which i have been alternating with tetris on the treadmill.

i'm thankful for [this joke about pavlov](https://twitter.com/miragonz/status/1227677611771326464). i'm thankful for [this video of kourtney kardashian eating bread](https://twitter.com/SayBiblePodcast/status/1226895574596640768). i'm thankful "[to wake up in the morning with a whole new list of things I’m going to remember for the rest of my fucking life](https://twitter.com/aubreybell/status/1226181109358006272)."

i'm thankful that d is allowed and in fact encouraged to bring miso to the office and that despite miso being loud and inappropriate, her boss and all her coworkers love miso, and i'm thankful that she took miso to work with her yesterday. i'm thankful that i did not have to be miso's doorman and that i could leave my lunch on the coffee table and walk to the kitchen without worrying that she would eat it.

i'm thankful that i kind of passive aggressively mentioned kh not attending an upcoming party since she didn't respond when i mentioned it in the group chat because it turned out not replying was not, as i imagined, a hard rjection but instead was her just not paying attention and i'm thankful that since i mentioned it she might come. i'm thankful for my various group chats. i'm thankful that k and t are moving closer to us.

i'm thankful i kind of halfway fixed my standing desk and have been standing for large parts of every day this week. i'm thankful that in our weekly team meeting there is a section where you talk about low points and high points of the week and i'm thankful that when i talked about the low point being that i thought i really knew our app well and was going to be immediately fast and productive and instead have been humbled by all i don't know, everybody told me that was normal and not to worry about it. 

i'm thankful for [this video of AOC introducing bernie](https://twitter.com/CoachSiteman/status/1227442426526208001) in new hampshire over the beat from "sicko mode," which i have watched like 15 times because it gives me strong ASMR, especially the part where the drums are pumping in and she's saying "forward, forward, forward." i'm thankful there are so many good memes [dunking](https://twitter.com/KateAronoff/status/1226010928686211074) on pete buttigieg.

i'm thankful for how excited d was about _p.s. i still love you_, which we watched last night and which isn't perfect or as good as the first movie but still has lots of great parts. i'm thankful _love is blind_ is coming out tomorrow and i'm excited about it. i'm thankful to have been reading rebecca solnit's _wanderlust_ and to be in a fascinating section about wordsworth's walks through the lake district. i'm thankful for the switch game _speedrunners_, a side scrolling racing game which i have been alternating with tetris on the treadmill.

i'm thankful for [this joke about pavlov](https://twitter.com/miragonz/status/1227677611771326464). i'm thankful for [this video of kourtney kardashian eating bread](https://twitter.com/SayBiblePodcast/status/1226895574596640768). i'm thankful "[to wake up in the morning with a whole new list of things I’m going to remember for the rest of my fucking life](https://twitter.com/aubreybell/status/1226181109358006272)."
